sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Cisco Systems topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Cisco Systems registers a 11.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble, trading down 0.8%.
Procter & Gamble is showing a gain of 3.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Wal-Mart Stores, trading down 0.8%, and Microsoft, trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
